channel.title: Blogs on Suburban Nerd
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Suburban Nerd

item.title: Introducing ... Me
item.description: Hey there, the internet is a turbulent place, and since I’ve moved around quite a few times, I think I forgot to introduce myself the last time I made the move. I am Marcus Ramberg, the writer of this blog, and director of Nordaaker, a small British/Norwegian company currently run out of Oslo, Norway. In addition to being my personal blog, at the time being this blog acts as Nordaaker’s dynamic english presence.

item.title: We Are Iron Man
item.description: Went to visit the Oslo rubyists today just to get the old worn out 'But we heard perl is dead', as a welcome. So worn out. Somehow they acknowledge that python is a nice language tho. So why has nobody heard from us in a while? Matt has a theory. But here's my point: Perl people hang out on mailing lists. We bottom post, carefully interleaved, with 76 character lines. We have signatures that meet the McQ standard for acceptable size.
